ValidationRule.description: Certain Attendee Types require the Account field to be filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "0124A000001BVDGQA4", NOT(ISPICKVAL( Attendee_Type__c , "Guest" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Attendee_Type__c , "Visitor" )), ISBLANK( Account__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select an Account for this attendee.
